reviewText: Takes me back to the times when The Lakers could not be stopped at all as they steamed rolled thru the Post season for the best record in post season history!
A Great Video synopsis of another GREAT season and championship for The LAKERS. Nicely done, brings you back to the excitement of the season and Championship. A Must have for all LAKERS Fans.

considering all the Lakers went through Last year it was Incredible at what they did.what a Great Playoff&Finals Run. The Lakers are Solid on this Video. Shaq&Kobe are together when it matters most. D-Fish hit big 3's. Rick Fox was solid.and the Money Man Himself Robert"Will Smith" Horry is all Money. Phil Jackson spreading the Zen all around. Looking for another Gold Ball this Year.
being the firstperson to review this fine video, i am inclined to say that it represents this fine championship of this fine american game quite well.  As we hungarians say.  Go basketball! Buy DVD!
